error.signature: RuntimeError: CUDA error: all CUDA-capable devices are busy or unavailable
error.regex: all CUDA-capable devices are busy or unavailable

verdict.summary: All GPUs are in use by other processes or the CUDA driver failed to initialize.

dead_ends.action: Killing all GPU processes with nvidia-smi --gpu-reset
dead_ends.why_fails: May corrupt running training jobs; data loss
Requires root; kills all GPU processes

workarounds.action: Check GPU usage: nvidia-smi — identify which processes are using the GPUs
workarounds.how: Look for processes with high memory usage that can be stopped safely

workarounds.action: Set CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES to use a specific free GPU
workarounds.how: export CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES=1 — restricts to GPU 1 only
